mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_ROOM (ROOM_NO, USER1_NO, USER2_NO, PRODUCT_NO, CREATED_AT, STATUS) VALUES ( SEQ_CHAT_ROOM.NEXTVAL, #{user1No}, #{user2No}, #{productNo}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE (MESSAGE_NO, ROOM_NO, SENDER_NO, CONTENT, SENT_AT, IS_READ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHAT_MESSAGE.NEXTVAL, #{roomNo}, #{senderNo}, #{content}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT CR.ROOM_NO, CR.PRODUCT_NO, CR.USER1_NO AS SELLER_NO, P.PRODUCT_TITLE, M.USER_NAME, CM.CONTENT AS LAST_MESSAGE, TO_CHAR(CM.SENT_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_SENT_AT, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAT_MESSAGE MSG WHERE MSG.ROOM_NO = CR.ROOM_NO AND MSG.SENDER_NO != #{userNo} AND MSG.IS_READ = 'N' ) AS UNREAD_COUNT FROM CHAT_ROOM CR JOIN PRODUCT_BOARD P ON CR.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO JOIN ( SELECT ROOM_NO, CONTENT, SENT_AT FROM ( SELECT ROOM_NO, CONTENT, SENT_AT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ROOM_NO ORDER BY SENT_AT DESC) AS RN FROM CHAT_MESSAGE ) WHERE RN = 1 ) CM ON CR.ROOM_NO = CM.ROOM_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USER_NO = ( CASE WHEN CR.USER1_NO = #{userNo} THEN CR.USER2_NO ELSE CR.USER1_NO END ) WHERE CR.USER1_NO = #{userNo} OR CR.USER2_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY LAST_SENT_AT DESC NULLS LAST
